summary: Welcome to the Next Frontier: Embracing the Web3 Realm in Gaming - NexGami and MetaMyth are user-friendly and decentralized platforms in the GameFi supporting space. They offer RPG, Metaverse, Mining, X2E, and NFTs. The platforms focus on ease of use, no mandatory registration or wallet, ESports competition, community interaction, liquidity, and open cooperation. They aim to ensure individual failures do not affect the global economy. The platforms also provide a transparent tokenomics model, unique game mechanics, flexible API integration, and a harmonious transaction fee structure.
